answers.answer: Good luck! I'll be praying everything is fine, keep us updated if possible!
I'll be praying too I would have went to the e.r.
Praying for you!! Keep us updated.
Thanks ladies ... I was going to go the er but my mom told me to call my dr and I did and she told me to come in :/ I'm hoping everything's okay ....  i

Update my cervix is closed so that's a good thing dr said baby is HUGE and  just being LAZY. I have gestational diabetes and hypertension .... So I'm high risk he said bleeding is prob just from being to active and I need to take it easy. Thanks for the prayers

question: I'm 31w3d woke up this morning there was a good amount of blood in the toilet and on the tp. Haven't felt my son move much and had really bad back pain all last night. I called the Dr this morning and they told me to come in at 1:45 :/ I'm really worried.  (Sorry not really a question)
title: bleeding
